text: I think filters can be used when writing to Parallel HDF5 files/datasets, but only when doing collective writes (i.e. not when doing independent writes).  If that's true, then that limitation would be good to mention a bit more explicitly (ideally in the HDF5 docs, but a mention in the HDF5.jl docs would be helpful too).  It seems there are some other collective-vs-independent caveats with Parallel HDF5 that could be elucidated a bit more clearly IMHO.  I feel like I'm encountering "gotchas" that could have been prevented with better warning signs. :confused:
